snippet.title: Dark Star ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
Another beer and I'm getting the hang of it.
This time I manage to liberate a planet and re-fill my energy by flying through the blue energy gate whilst in space.
This vid also shows using the warp-gates to get between systems

I used to love this game back in the day and you know what? It's still pretty damn playable.

If you like vector graphics game then this one is well worth playing. You can customize this game too, change the screen, change the sound effects, change the enemy missiles etc.

An awesome piece of programming.

http://zxspectrumgames.blogspot.com
http://amiga-games.blogspot.com
http://those-funny-games.blogspot.com
